EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2014 - 2014.09.18.Email - Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your registration is confirmed for Accelerate 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for your registration. Here are your confirmation details:
Tricentis Accelerate 2014
Thursday, Sept 18, 2014
Hotel InterContinental Vienna, Johannesgasse 28, 1030 Vienna, Austria
from 9:15 a.m. till 7:00 p.m.
To view the full agenda and learn more about the event, visit: accelerate.tricentis.com <http://accelerate.tricentis.com>
We are looking forward to see you there.
Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/?> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
© 2014 Tricentis. All Rights Reserved. Tricentis is a registered trademark of Tricentis GmbH.
Tricentis | Leonard-Bernstein-Straße 10 | A-1220 Vienna | Imprint <http://www.tricentis.com/imprint/>
